preCopyScript.value:
if   object_id('@{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}') is not null  
  truncate table @{pipeline().parameters.FACTORY}STG.@{pipeline().parameters.TABLENAME}

STGSQL.defaultValue: SELECT replace(COMPANY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') COMPANY , 	   replace(IDENTITY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') IDENTITY , 	   replace(PARTY_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PARTY_TYPE , 	   INVOICE_ID , 	   ROWVERSION , 	   replace(ROWSTATE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') ROWSTATE , 	   replace(SERIES_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') SERIES_ID , 	   replace(INVOICE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') INVOICE_NO , 	   replace(HEAD_DATA, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') HEAD_DATA , 	   replace(CREATOR, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CREATOR , 	   INVOICE_DATE , 	   TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') DUE_DATE , 	   replace(CASH, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CASH , 	   replace(COLLECT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') COLLECT , 	   replace(INT_ALLOWED, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') INT_ALLOWED , 	   replace(INVOICE_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') INVOICE_TYPE , 	   replace(PAY_TERM_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PAY_TERM_ID , 	   replace(AFF_BASE_LEDG_POST, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') AFF_BASE_LEDG_POST , 	   replace(AFF_LINE_POST, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') AFF_LINE_POST , 	   TO_CHAR(DELIVERY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') DELIVERY_DATE , 	   TO_CHAR(ARRIVAL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') ARRIVAL_DATE , 	   replace(NOTES, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') NOTES , 	   replace(SERIES_REFERENCE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') SERIES_REFERENCE , 	   replace(NUMBER_REFERENCE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') NUMBER_REFERENCE , 	   replace(DELIVERY_IDENTITY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') DELIVERY_IDENTITY , 	   replace(DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID , 	   replace(INVOICE_ADDRESS_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') INVOICE_ADDRESS_ID , 	   replace(CREATORS_REFERENCE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CREATORS_REFERENCE , 	   replace(NATIONAL_BANK_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') NATIONAL_BANK_CODE , 	   CREATION_DATE ,replace(PRELIM_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PRELIM_CODE , 	   replace(PRE_ACC_CODE_STRING, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PRE_ACC_CODE_STRING , 	   CURR_RATE , 	   DIV_FACTOR , 	   replace(DELIVERY_PARTY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') DELIVERY_PARTY , 	   JOUR_NO_PRINT , 	   JOUR_NO_VOUCHER , 	   replace(PAYMENT_ADDRESS_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PAYMENT_ADDRESS_ID , 	   replace(WAY_PAY_ID, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') WAY_PAY_ID , 	   TO_CHAR(CANCELED_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') CANCELED_TIME , 	   TO_CHAR(VOUCHER_NO_REF) VOUCHER_NO_REF , 	   replace(VOUCHER_TYPE_REF, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') VOUCHER_TYPE_REF , 	   TO_CHAR(VOUCHER_DATE_REF,'yyyy-mm-dd') VOUCHER_DATE_REF , 	   ACCOUNTING_YEAR_REF , 	   WITHHELD_VOUCHER_NO , 	   replace(WITHHELD_VOUCHER_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') WITHHELD_VOUCHER_TYPE , 	   WITHHELD_ACCOUNTING_YEAR ,replace(CODE_A, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_A , 	   replace(CODE_B, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_B , 	   replace(CODE_C, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_C , 	   replace(CODE_D, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_D , 	   replace(CODE_E, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_E , 	   replace(CODE_F, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_F , 	   replace(CODE_G, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_G , 	   replace(CODE_H, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_H , 	   replace(CODE_I, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_I , 	   replace(CODE_J, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CODE_J , 	   PROJECT_ACTIVITY_ID ,replace(PO_REF_NUMBER, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PO_REF_NUMBER , 	   TO_CHAR(PL_PAY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PL_PAY_DATE , 	   replace(LANGUAGE_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') LANGUAGE_CODE , 	   TO_CHAR(NET_CURR_AMOUNT) NET_CURR_AMOUNT , 	   TO_CHAR(VAT_CURR_AMOUNT) VAT_CURR_AMOUNT , 	   TO_CHAR(NET_DOM_AMOUNT) NET_DOM_AMOUNT , 	   TO_CHAR(VAT_DOM_AMOUNT) VAT_DOM_AMOUNT , 	   replace(CURRENCY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CURRENCY , 	   replace(C1, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C1 , 	   replace(C2, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C2 , 	   replace(C3, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C3 , 	   replace(C4, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C4 , 	   replace(C5, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C5 , 	   replace(C6, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C6 , 	   replace(C7, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C7 , 	   replace(C8, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C8 , 	   replace(C9, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C9 , 	   replace(C10, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') C10 , 	   N1 ,N2 ,N3 ,D1 ,D2 ,D3 , 	   replace(CHK_HANDLING_CODE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CHK_HANDLING_CODE , 	   replace(SENT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') SENT , 	   replace(MULTI_COMPANY_INVOICE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') MULTI_COMPANY_INVOICE , 	   replace(ROWTYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') ROWTYPE , 	   replace(CREATE_STATE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CREATE_STATE , 	   replace(OK_CREATE_VOUCHER, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') OK_CREATE_VOUCHER , 	   replace(MULTI_INVOICE_VOUCHER, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') MULTI_INVOICE_VOUCHER , 	   replace(VOUCHER_FINAL_POST, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') VOUCHER_FINAL_POST , 	   replace(VOUCHER_VAT_ONLY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') VOUCHER_VAT_ONLY , 	   replace(PROPOSED_VOUCHER_GROUP, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PROPOSED_VOUCHER_GROUP , 	   replace(AUTOMATIC_INVOICE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') AUTOMATIC_INVOICE , 	   replace(TRANSFER_STATUS, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') TRANSFER_STATUS , 	   replace(TRANSFER_ERROR, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') TRANSFER_ERROR , 	   replace(TRANSFER_IDENTITY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') TRANSFER_IDENTITY , 	   replace(INVOICE_FEE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') INVOICE_FEE , 	   replace(IS_VAT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') IS_VAT , 	   TO_CHAR(INVOICE_VERSION) INVOICE_VERSION , 	   replace(PAYER_IDENTITY, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PAYER_IDENTITY , 	   replace(DEDUCTION_GROUP, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') DEDUCTION_GROUP , 	   replace(GROSS_UP, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') GROSS_UP , 	   replace(NCF_REFERENCE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') NCF_REFERENCE , 	   replace(BRANCH, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') BRANCH , 	   TO_CHAR(PAY_TERM_BASE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') PAY_TERM_BASE_DATE , 	   replace(replace(VOUCHER_TEXT, CHR (13) || CHR (10), ''),'\','/') VOUCHER_TEXT , 	   replace(CORRECTION, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') CORRECTION , 	   replace(JS_INVOICE_TYPE, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_INVOICE_TYPE , 	   replace(JS_SENDED, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_SENDED , 	   replace(JS_RETURNED, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_RETURNED , 	   replace(JS_INVOICE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_INVOICE_NO , 	   replace(JS_VIRTUAL_INVOICE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_VIRTUAL_INVOICE_NO , 	   replace(JS_MEMO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') JS_MEMO , 	   TAX_CURR_RATE , 	   replace(PRICE_INCLUSIVE_TAX, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') PRICE_INCLUSIVE_TAX , 	   N_DOWNLOAD_TIMES , 	   N_DOWNLOAD_DATE , 	   replace(N_PRICE_FLAG, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') N_PRICE_FLAG , 	   replace(N_RECEIVE_NO, CHR (13) || CHR (10), '') N_RECEIVE_NO , 	   N_ACCEPT_REPORT_NO   ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') BICreateTime FROM IFSAPP.INVOICE_TAB col where exists (select 1 from IFSAPP.HISTORY_LOG_TAB hl where  substr(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'COMPANY') + LENGTH('COMPANY')+1,+99),0,INSTR(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'COMPANY') + LENGTH('COMPANY')+1,+99),'^')-1) = col.COMPANY and substr(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'INVOICE_ID') + LENGTH('INVOICE_ID')+1,+99),0,INSTR(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'INVOICE_ID') + LENGTH('INVOICE_ID')+1,+99),'^')-1) = col.INVOICE_ID  and substr(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'IDENTITY') + LENGTH('IDENTITY')+1,+99),0,INSTR(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'IDENTITY') + LENGTH('IDENTITY')+1,+99),'^')-1) = col.IDENTITY  and substr(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'PARTY_TYPE') + LENGTH('PARTY_TYPE')+1,+99),0,INSTR(substr(hl.keys,INSTR(hl.keys,'PARTY_TYPE') + LENGTH('PARTY_TYPE')+1,+99),'^')-1) = col.PARTY_TYPE  and hl.table_name = 'INVOICE_TAB' AND hl.LU_NAME  = 'Invoice' and (hl.history_type = '1' or hl.history_type = '2') and TO_CHAR(hl.time_stamp,'yyyy-mm-dd') >=

MERGE.defaultValue: DELETE FROM [CK].[INVOICE_TAB] WHERE EXISTS  (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM [CKSTG].[INVOICE_TAB]  WHERE   [CKSTG].[INVOICE_TAB].[COMPANY] = [CK].[INVOICE_TAB].[COMPANY]   AND [CKSTG].[INVOICE_TAB].[IDENTITY] = [CK].[INVOICE_TAB].[IDENTITY]   AND [CKSTG].[INVOICE_TAB].[INVOICE_ID] = [CK].[INVOICE_TAB].[INVOICE_ID]  AND [CKSTG].[INVOICE_TAB].[PARTY_TYPE] = [CK].[INVOICE_TAB].[PARTY_TYPE])
